content: this dishcloth uses a textured honeycomb inspired stitch pattern to create a pretty and effective piece to use in the kitchen > > be sure to join **the weekly yarn** 1 mailing list at ** http //bit ly/theweeklyyarn 2 ** to be the first to know about new designs 1 http //bit ly/theweeklyyarn 2 http //bit ly/theweeklyyarn **difficulty level ** intermediate **sizes included ** 8 5 x 9 **yarn lines ** cotlin dk yarn **yardage ** 123 **hooks suggested ** size f/5 3 75mm crochet hook **fiber type ** cotton & blends **weight** dk
